trans-unit.source: Log in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Se connecter à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> enables to view a variety of information about your Server environment and to perform administrative tasks.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> enables to view a variety of information about your Server environment and to perform administrative tasks.

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permet d'afficher une série d'informations sur votre environnement de serveur et d'effectuer certaines tâches administratives.

trans-unit.source: To configure the protection of <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents on the server, you must connect to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Launch a browser and enter this URL:

seg-source.mrk: Launch a browser and enter this URL:

target.mrk: Lancez un navigateur et saisissez cette URL :

trans-unit.source: http://:8181/

seg-source.mrk: http://:8181/

target.mrk: http://:8181/

trans-unit.source: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the default port used for a standalone server. Depending on the profile of the user you are connecting with, some information may or may not be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the default port used for a standalone server.
Depending on the profile of the user you are connecting with, some information may or may not be displayed.

target.mrk: est le nom de réseau de votre serveur et 8181 est le port par défaut utilisé pour un serveur autonome (standalone server).
Selon le profil de l'utilisateur avec lequel vous vous connectez, certaines informations peuvent ou pas être affichées.

trans-unit.source: Standalone configuration: http://:8181/

seg-source.mrk: Standalone configuration: http://:8181/

target.mrk: Configuration autonome : http://:8181/

trans-unit.source: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the default port used for a standalone server. Depending on the profile of the user you are connecting with, some information may or may not be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the default port used for a standalone server.
Depending on the profile of the user you are connecting with, some information may or may not be displayed.

target.mrk: est le nom de réseau de votre serveur et 8181 est le port par défaut utilisé pour un serveur autonome.
Selon le profil de l'utilisateur avec lequel vous vous connectez, certaines informations peuvent ou pas être affichées.

trans-unit.source: Multi-server configuration:

seg-source.mrk: Multi-server configuration:

target.mrk: Configuration multi-serveur :

trans-unit.source: https://p:/AAdmin/.

seg-source.mrk: https://p:/AAdmin/.

target.mrk: https://p:/AAdmin/.

trans-unit.source: You can switch between a standalone server (port 8184) and a master server (port 8182), but you cannot access both servers at once on the .

seg-source.mrk: You can switch between a standalone server (port 8184) and a master server (port 8182), but you cannot access both servers at once on the .

target.mrk: Vous pouvez basculer entre un serveur autonome (port 8184) et un serveur master (port 8182), mais vous ne pouvez pas accéder aux deux serveurs à la fois sur la .

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Select a language (English or French).

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Select a language (English or French).

target.mrk: (Facultatif) Sélectionnez une langue (anglais ou français).

trans-unit.source: (Optional) In the Authentication window, leave the Tenant field empty. This field is only useful when multiple tenants exist.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) In the Authentication window, leave the Tenant field empty.
This field is only useful when multiple tenants exist.

target.mrk: (Facultatif) Dans la fenêtre Authentification, laissez le champ Entité vide.
Ce champ n'est utile que lorsque plusieurs entités existent.

trans-unit.source: Type your username, then your password. By default, superadmin is the username and password used for administrators.

seg-source.mrk: Type your username, then your password.
By default, superadmin is the username and password used for administrators.

target.mrk: Saisissez votre nom d'utilisateur, puis votre mot de passe.
Par défaut, superadmin est le nom d'utilisateur et le mot de passe utilisés par les administrateurs.

trans-unit.source: Click Login.

seg-source.mrk: Click Login.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Connexion.

trans-unit.source: The interface of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is displayed <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#HSS_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

seg-source.mrk: The interface of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is displayed <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#HSS_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

target.mrk: L'interface de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s'affiche <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#HSS_dashboard_server_environment" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

trans-unit.source: If you are on a multi-server instance, an icon displays besides the list of tenants in the upper-left part of the dashboard: (master server) and (node).

seg-source.mrk: If you are on a multi-server instance, an icon displays besides the list of tenants in the upper-left part of the dashboard: (master server) and (node).

target.mrk: Si vous êtes sur une instance multi-serveurs, une icône s'affiche près de la liste des entités dans la partie supérieure gauche du tableau de bord : (serveur master) et (nœud).

trans-unit.source: The dashboard consists of customizable dashboard tiles that provide real-time information about the server environment.

seg-source.mrk: The dashboard consists of customizable dashboard tiles that provide real-time information about the server environment.

target.mrk: Le tableau de bord se compose de tuiles personnalisables qui fournissent des informations en temps réel sur l'environnement du serveur.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> view.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> view.

target.mrk: Vue de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Icons positioned in each tile provide additional information: for instance,, , indicate the alert level.

seg-source.mrk: Icons positioned in each tile provide additional information: for instance,, , indicate the alert level.

target.mrk: Les icônes positionnées dans chaque tuile fournissent des informations supplémentaires : par exemple,,, indiquent le niveau d'alerte.

trans-unit.source: Connection procedures used in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Connection procedures used in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Procédures de connexion utilisées dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Here are the different connection procedures:

seg-source.mrk: Here are the different connection procedures:

target.mrk: Voici les différentes procédures de connexion :

trans-unit.source: Local Login

seg-source.mrk: Local Login

target.mrk: Authentification locale

trans-unit.source: The login procedure checks if the username you have provided matches an entry in the local user database.

seg-source.mrk: The login procedure checks if the username you have provided matches an entry in the local user database.

target.mrk: La procédure de connexion vérifie que le nom d'utilisateur fourni correspond à une entrée dans la base de données d'utilisateurs locale.

trans-unit.source: If it matches, a local user login procedure takes place and access is granted with the privileges corresponding to the login provided, either as a Default user or Administrator.

seg-source.mrk: If it matches, a local user login procedure takes place and access is granted with the privileges corresponding to the login provided, either as a Default user or Administrator.

target.mrk: Si cela correspond, une procédure de connexion d'utilisateur local prend place et l'accès est accordé avec les privilèges correspondant à l'authentification fournie, soit en tant qu'utilisateur par défaut ou administrateur.

trans-unit.source: If the user is not active, or if the username or password is incorrect, the login fails and access is denied.

seg-source.mrk: If the user is not active, or if the username or password is incorrect, the login fails and access is denied.

target.mrk: Si l'utilisateur n'est pas actif, ou si le nom d'utilisateur ou le mot de passe est incorrect, l'authentification échoue et l'accès est refusé.

trans-unit.source: LDAP Login

seg-source.mrk: LDAP Login

target.mrk: Authentification LDAP

trans-unit.source: If there is no match in the local database, the procedure checks whether the user name string contains a domain (DOMAIN\USER or USER@DOMAIN). If no domain is present, the default domain is added. A login request is then initiated through LDAP for .

seg-source.mrk: If there is no match in the local database, the procedure checks whether the user name string contains a domain (DOMAIN\USER or USER@DOMAIN).
If no domain is present, the default domain is added.
A login request is then initiated through LDAP for .

target.mrk: Si aucune correspondance n'est trouvée dans la base de données locale, la procédure vérifie si la chaîne de nom d'utilisateur contient un domaine (DOMAINE\UTILISATEUR ou UTILISATEUR@DOMAINE).
Si aucun domaine n'est présent, le domaine par défaut est ajouté.
Une requête d'authentification est alors initiée via LDAP pour .

trans-unit.source: If login fails, access is denied.

seg-source.mrk: If login fails, access is denied.

target.mrk: Si l'authentification échoue, l'accès est refusé.

trans-unit.source: If the login procedure succeeds:

seg-source.mrk: If the login procedure succeeds:

target.mrk: Si la procédure d'authentification réussit :

trans-unit.source: If matches an entry in the user table, access is granted with the corresponding privileges (Default user or Administrator). If the user is not active, access is denied.

seg-source.mrk: If matches an entry in the user table, access is granted with the corresponding privileges (Default user or Administrator).
If the user is not active, access is denied.

target.mrk: Si correspond à une entrée dans le tableau utilisateur, l'accès est accordé avec les privilèges correspondants (Utilisateur par défaut ou Administrateur).
Si l'utilisateur est inactif, l'accès est refusé.

trans-unit.source: If no entry is found in the user table, for all groups the user belongs to, the procedure checks if the group matches an entry that is active and retrieves the corresponding privileges (Default user or Administrator):

seg-source.mrk: If no entry is found in the user table, for all groups the user belongs to, the procedure checks if the group matches an entry that is active and retrieves the corresponding privileges (Default user or Administrator):

target.mrk: Si aucune entrée n'est trouvée dans le tableau utilisateur, pour tous les groupes auxquels l'utilisateur appartient, la procédure vérifie si le groupe correspond à une entrée active et récupère les privilèges correspondants (utilisateur par défaut ou administrateur) :

trans-unit.source: If at least one active group has administrator privileges, access is granted as administrator.

seg-source.mrk: If at least one active group has administrator privileges, access is granted as administrator.

target.mrk: Si au moins un groupe actif a des privilèges d'administrateur, l'accès est accordé en tant qu'administrateur.

trans-unit.source: If at least one active group is found, access is granted as a default user.

seg-source.mrk: If at least one active group is found, access is granted as a default user.

target.mrk: Si au moins un groupe actif est trouvé, l'accès est accordé en tant qu'utilisateur par défaut.

trans-unit.source: If no active group is found, access is denied.

seg-source.mrk: If no active group is found, access is denied.

target.mrk: Si aucun groupe actif n'est trouvé, l'accès est refusé.

trans-unit.source: If more than one tenant exists, and one was entered in the connection screen, it predominates at the application opening. If nothing has been specified, the auto-connection is taken into account. If the auto-connection has not been set, the default domain is taken into account. See <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenant Creation</MadCap:xref> for more details on auto-connection.

seg-source.mrk: If more than one tenant exists, and one was entered in the connection screen, it predominates at the application opening.
If nothing has been specified, the auto-connection is taken into account.
If the auto-connection has not been set, the default domain is taken into account.
See <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenant Creation</MadCap:xref> for more details on auto-connection.

target.mrk: Si plus d'une entité existe et qu'une entité a été saisie lors de la connexion, cette entité prédomine lors de l'ouverture de l'application.
Si rien n'a été spécifié, la connexion automatique est prise en compte.
Si la connexion automatique n'a pas été définie, le domaine par défaut est pris en compte.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenant Creation</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails sur la connexion automatique.

trans-unit.source: Understand the Tabs in the <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Understand the Tabs in the <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Comprendre les onglets dans la <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: The tabs on the left pane can be used to navigate in the . For more information on customizing the main screen, see the display of dashboard items in the General Preferences (Settings > Preferences).

seg-source.mrk: The tabs on the left pane can be used to navigate in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
For more information on customizing the main screen, see the display of dashboard items in the General Preferences (Settings > Preferences).

target.mrk: Les onglets du volet gauche peuvent être utilisés pour naviguer dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour plus d'informations sur la personnalisation de l'écran principal, voir l'affichage des éléments du tableau de bord dans les Préférences générales (Paramètres > Préférences).

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contains the following tabs:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contains the following tabs:

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contient les onglets suivants :

trans-unit.source: Dashboard: The dashboard consists of customizable dashboard tiles that provide real-time information about the server environment.

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard: The dashboard consists of customizable dashboard tiles that provide real-time information about the server environment.

target.mrk: Tableau de bord : Le tableau de bord se compose de tuiles de tableau de bord personnalisables qui fournissent des informations en temps réel sur l'environnement du serveur.

trans-unit.source: Notifications: This tab contains a list of notifications sent from the servers.

seg-source.mrk: Notifications: This tab contains a list of notifications sent from the servers.

target.mrk: Notifications : Cet onglet contient une liste des notifications envoyées par les serveurs.

trans-unit.source: Agents: This tab contains a list of agents used on one or all the tenant(s).

seg-source.mrk: Agents: This tab contains a list of agents used on one or all the tenant(s).

target.mrk: Agents : Cet onglet contient une liste des agents utilisés sur un ou toutes les entités.

trans-unit.source: Backup: This tab contains information on strategies, protections, protection rules and zones, and files categories used on the servers.

seg-source.mrk: Backup: This tab contains information on strategies, protections, protection rules and zones, and files categories used on the servers.

target.mrk: Sauvegarde : Cet onglet contient des informations sur les stratégies, les protections, les règles et zones de protection et les catégories de fichiers utilisées sur les serveurs.

trans-unit.source: Restore: This tab can be used to manage restore tokens and restore files, folders or a set of agents.

seg-source.mrk: Restore: This tab can be used to manage restore tokens and restore files, folders or a set of agents.

target.mrk: Restauration : Cet onglet peut être utilisé pour gérer les jetons de restauration et restaurer des fichiers, des dossiers ou un ensemble d'agents.

trans-unit.source: Server: This tab contains information on users, tenants, nodes, replications and system information (system services, backup reports, events and boot information).

seg-source.mrk: Server: This tab contains information on users, tenants, nodes, replications and system information (system services, backup reports, events and boot information).

target.mrk: Serveur : Cet onglet contient des informations sur les utilisateurs, les entités, les nœuds, les réplications et les informations système (services système, rapports de sauvegarde, événements et informations de démarrage).

trans-unit.source: Understand the Tiles in the Dashboard of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Understand the Tiles in the Dashboard of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Comprendre les tuiles dans le tableau de bord de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Dashboard tiles can be used to view, access or modify specific information. The dashboard is customizable : all tiles can be moved or hidden, using the button.

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard tiles can be used to view, access or modify specific information.
The dashboard is customizable : all tiles can be moved or hidden, using the button.

target.mrk: Les tuiles de tableau de bord peuvent être utilisées pour afficher, accéder ou modifier des informations spécifiques.
Le tableau de bord est personnalisable : toutes les tuiles peuvent être déplacées ou masquées à l'aide du bouton .

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contains the following tiles:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contains the following tiles:

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contient les tuiles suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Notifications: This tile contains all notifications ordered by severity.

seg-source.mrk: Notifications: This tile contains all notifications ordered by severity.

target.mrk: Notifications : Cette tuile contient toutes les notifications classées par sévérité.

trans-unit.source: Agents: This tile contains information about agents such as the number of protected agents or agents that require an update.

seg-source.mrk: Agents: This tile contains information about agents such as the number of protected agents or agents that require an update.

target.mrk: Agents : cette tuile contient des informations sur les agents, telles que le nombre d'agents protégés ou d'agents nécessitant une mise à jour.

trans-unit.source: Volumes: This tile contains information as deduplication ratio or disk use.

seg-source.mrk: Volumes: This tile contains information as deduplication ratio or disk use.

target.mrk: Volumes : Cette tuile contient des informations telles que le taux de déduplication ou d'utilisation du disque.

trans-unit.source: Hardware: This tile contains information on CPU and RAM usage.

seg-source.mrk: Hardware: This tile contains information on CPU and RAM usage.

target.mrk: Matériel : Cette tuile contient des informations sur l'utilisation du processeur et de la RAM.

trans-unit.source: Activity: This tile contains information on the server activity, such as backup or restore activity.

seg-source.mrk: Activity: This tile contains information on the server activity, such as backup or restore activity.

target.mrk: Activité : cette tuile contient des informations sur l'activité du serveur, telles que l'activité de sauvegarde ou de restauration.

trans-unit.source: License: This tile contains information such as the license server status and the number of available tokens.

seg-source.mrk: License: This tile contains information such as the license server status and the number of available tokens.

target.mrk: Licence : cette tuile contient des informations telles que l'état du serveur de licences et le nombre de jetons disponibles.

trans-unit.source: Nodes (multi-server only): This tile contains information on the nodes managed by the master server (total number of nodes, unattached nodes, offline nodes). If a node is offline, an agent cannot be backed up.

seg-source.mrk: Nodes (multi-server only): This tile contains information on the nodes managed by the master server (total number of nodes, unattached nodes, offline nodes).
If a node is offline, an agent cannot be backed up.

target.mrk: Nœuds (multi-serveur uniquement) : Cette tuile contient des informations sur les nœuds gérés par le serveur maître (nombre total de nœuds, nœuds non attachés, nœuds hors ligne).
Si un nœud est hors ligne, un agent ne peut pas être sauvegardé.

trans-unit.source: Perform a search in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Perform a search in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Effectuer une recherche dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is equipped with a built-in search engine. To use the search engine:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is equipped with a built-in search engine.
To use the search engine:

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est équipée d'un moteur de recherche intégré.
Pour utiliser le moteur de recherche :

trans-unit.source: Click the magnifying glass in the upper-right corner of the window and type a keyword in the search bar.

seg-source.mrk: Click the magnifying glass in the upper-right corner of the window and type a keyword in the search bar.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur la loupe dans le coin supérieur droit de la fenêtre et tapez un mot-clé dans la barre de recherche.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the keyword entered, the search engine may find items created by a user (administration objects) or User Interface elements included in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> User Interface (application sections). Regular users or administrators can only find items they created.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the keyword entered, the search engine may find items created by a user (administration objects) or User Interface elements included in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> User Interface (application sections).
Regular users or administrators can only find items they created.

target.mrk: Selon le mot-clé saisi, le moteur de recherche peut trouver des éléments créés par un utilisateur (objets d'administration) ou des éléments d'interface utilisateur inclus dans l'interface utilisateur de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (sections de l'application).
Les utilisateurs réguliers ou les administrateurs ne peuvent trouver que les éléments qu'ils ont créés.
